sentences.sentence: They say that portraying introduced species as inherently bad is an unscientific approach.
sentences.translation: 他们说把外来物种描绘成天生的坏物种是一种不科学的做法。

sentences.sentence: In its most general sense, prescriptivism is the view that one variety of language has an inherently higher value than others, and that this ought to be imposed on the whole of the speech community.
sentences.translation: 从最普遍的意义上说，规定主义指一种语言比其他语言具有更高的内在价值，而这种价值应该强加于整个语言群体。
